channel.title: List of tasks in NotePlan?
channel.description: Hi there! I am considering moving to NotePlan 3 as my Task Management system, since I am a Setapp subscriber. There are a couple of NotePlan actions and action groups in the directory, however I can't find any action that will take a list of items and turn them into separate tasks in NotePlan. Does anybody have any suggestion on how to accomplish this? Thanks!
